name: Scenario_PreAlpha_FortifiedHouse_B
journelText:
As I strode confidently into the building I felt the discharge of a weapon at around knee height. Evidently the owners had booby trapped the building, however this cowardly trap was naught but a mild inconvience and was in no way an agonisingly painful mistake that left me in the fetal position for 10 minutes. 

 [EFFECT](SUB_ENERGY){20} [PAGE BREAK][BUTTON](Scenario_PreAlpha_FortifiedHouse_A){Next}
